nodes.documentation:
Minimal interface definition for KODA V2 contract calls
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
nodes.name: IKODAV2Controls

nodes.documentation:
@title Artists self minting for KnownOrigin (KODA)
* Allows for the edition artists to mint there own assets and control the price of an edition
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
* BE ORIGINAL. BUY ORIGINAL.
nodes.name: ArtistEditionControls

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Unable to send to zero address"

arguments.value: Unable to send to zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Unable to send to zero address"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only from the edition artist account"

arguments.value: Only from the edition artist account

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only from the edition artist account"

nodes.name: gift

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only from the edition artist account"

arguments.value: Only from the edition artist account

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only from the edition artist account"

nodes.name: updateEditionPrice

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the KODA address
@dev Only callable from owner
